00039 ConstraintRenderObject::ConstraintRenderObject(Constraint * constraint, SceneManager * mgr)
00040     : RenderObject(mgr), mp_constraint(constraint), mp_node(), mp_particle(NULL)
00041 {
00042 }

00044 Constraint * ConstraintRenderObject::getConstraint()
00045 {
00046     return mp_constraint;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void ConstraintRenderObject::updateEffects(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation)
00050 {
00051     Vector3 offset = mp_constraint->getTarget()->position() - mp_constraint->getOrigin()->position();
00052     mp_node->setPosition(mp_constraint->getOrigin()->position() + (offset * Real(0.5)));
00053     mp_node->setOrientation(Vector3(0, 0, -1).getRotationTo(offset));
00054 
00055     // Note: This relies on a single Cylinder emitter being present in the Orewar/ConstraintStream script
00056     mp_particle->getEmitter(0)->setParameter("depth", Ogre::StringConverter::toString(offset.length()));
00057 }
00058 
00059 void ConstraintRenderObject::loadSceneResources()
00060 {
00061 }
00062  
00063 void ConstraintRenderObject::createEffects()
00064 {
00065     mp_node = getSceneManager()->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00066 
00067     std::stringstream oss;
00068     oss << "Constraint" << renderId();
00069     mp_particle = getSceneManager()->createParticleSystem(oss.str(), "Orewar/ConstraintStream");
00070     mp_particle->setEmitting(true);
00071     mp_node->attachObject(mp_particle);
00072 }
00073 
00074 void ConstraintRenderObject::destroyEffects()
00075 {
00076     mp_node->detachAllObjects();
00077     mp_node->removeAllChildren();
00078     getSceneManager()->destroyParticleSystem(mp_particle);
00079     getSceneManager()->destroySceneNode(mp_node);
00080 }

00111 /** Updates the node based on passed time and camera orientation (useful for sprites) */
00112 void ShipRO::updateEffects(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation)
00113 {
00114     mp_shipNode->setPosition(getObject()->position());
00115     mp_shipNode->setOrientation(getObject()->orientation());
00116 }

00118 void ShipRO::loadSceneResources() 
00119 {
00120     if(!m_resourcesLoaded) {
00121         m_resourcesLoaded = true;
00122     }

00124 
00125 void ShipRO::createEffects()
00126 {
00127     mp_shipNode = getSceneManager()->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00128     std::stringstream oss;
00129     oss << "Ship" << renderId();
00130     mp_shipEntity = getSceneManager()->createEntity(oss.str(), "RZR-002.mesh");
00131     mp_shipEntity->setCastShadows(true);
00132     mp_shipNode->setScale(10, 10, 10);
00133     mp_shipRotateNode = mp_shipNode->createChildSceneNode();
00134     mp_shipRotateNode->setDirection(Vector3(0, 0, 1));
00135     mp_shipRotateNode->attachObject(mp_shipEntity);
00136 
00137     // Add a spot light to the ship of it's the player ship
00138     oss << "L";
00139     mp_spotLight = getSceneManager()->createLight(oss.str());
00140     mp_spotLight->setType(Light::LT_SPOTLIGHT);
00141     mp_spotLight->setDiffuseColour(0.8, 0.8, 1.0);
00142     mp_spotLight->setSpecularColour(0.2, 0.2, 1.0);
00143     mp_spotLight->setDirection(0, 0, -1);
00144     mp_spotLight->setPosition(Vector3(0, 30, 0));
00145     mp_spotLight->setSpotlightRange(Degree(20), Degree(45));
00146     mp_shipNode->attachObject(mp_spotLight);
00147 
00148     // Add a point light above the ship
00149     oss << "L";
00150     mp_pointLight = getSceneManager()->createLight(oss.str());
00151     mp_pointLight->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_POINT);
00152     mp_pointLight->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0, 30, 0));
00153     if (getObject()->type() == ObjectType::SHIP) {
00154         mp_pointLight->setDiffuseColour(0.4, 0.1, 0.1);
00155         mp_pointLight->setSpecularColour(0.4, 0.4, 0.4);
00156     } else {
00157         mp_pointLight->setDiffuseColour(0.1, 0.1, 0.5);
00158         mp_pointLight->setSpecularColour(0.4, 0.4, 0.4);
00159     }
00160     mp_shipNode->attachObject(mp_pointLight);
00161 
00162     // Add the engine particle stream
00163     oss << "P";
00164     mp_engineParticles = getSceneManager()->createParticleSystem(oss.str(), "Orewar/EngineStream");
00165     mp_engineParticles->setEmitting(true);
00166     mp_shipNode->attachObject(mp_engineParticles);
00167 }
00168 
00169 void ShipRO::destroyEffects()
00170 {
00171     mp_shipNode->removeAllChildren();
00172     mp_shipNode->detachAllObjects();
00173     mp_shipRotateNode->removeAllChildren();
00174     mp_shipRotateNode->detachAllObjects();
00175     getSceneManager()->destroyMovableObject(mp_shipEntity);
00176 
00177     getSceneManager()->destroyLight(mp_spotLight);
00178     getSceneManager()->destroyLight(mp_pointLight);
00179     getSceneManager()->destroyParticleSystem(mp_engineParticles);
00180 }

00188 NpcShipRO::NpcShipRO(SpaceShip * ship, SceneManager * mgr)
00189     : ShipRO(ship, mgr), mp_frameNode(NULL), mp_frameSprite(NULL), mp_screen(NULL),
00190     mp_healthBar(NULL), mp_energyBar(NULL)
00191 {
00192 }
00193 
00194 void NpcShipRO::updateEffects(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation)
00195 {
00196     ShipRO::updateEffects(elapsedTime, camOrientation);
00197     mp_frameNode->setPosition(getObject()->position());
00198     mp_frameNode->setOrientation(camOrientation);
00199 
00200     mp_healthBar->width((ship()->health() / ship()->maxHealth()) * 25000);
00201     mp_energyBar->width((ship()->energy() / ship()->maxEnergy()) * 25000);
00202 }
00203 
00204 
00205 void NpcShipRO::loadSceneResources()
00206 {
00207     ShipRO::loadSceneResources();
00208     if(!m_resourcesLoaded) {
00209         Plane planeTarget = Plane(Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Z, 0);
00210         MeshManager::getSingleton().createPlane("targetFrameSprite", Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::DEFAULT_RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME,
00211             planeTarget, 250, 250, 1, 1, true, 1, 1, 1, Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Y);
00212     }
00213 }
00214 
00215 void NpcShipRO::createEffects()
00216 {
00217     ShipRO::createEffects();
00218     mp_frameNode = getSceneManager()->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00219 
00220     std::stringstream oss;
00221     oss << "TargetFrame" << renderId();
00222     mp_frameSprite = getSceneManager()->createEntity(oss.str(), "targetFrameSprite");
00223     mp_frameSprite->setMaterialName("Orewar/TargetFrame");
00224     mp_frameSprite->setCastShadows(false);
00225     mp_frameNode->attachObject(mp_frameSprite);
00226 
00227     
00228     Viewport * p_vp = getSceneManager()->getCamera("Camera")->getViewport();
00229     Gorilla::Silverback * gorilla = Gorilla::Silverback::getSingletonPtr();
00230     mp_screen = gorilla->createScreenRenderable(Vector2(250, 440), "dejavu");
00231     mp_frameNode->attachObject(mp_screen);
00232 
00233     Gorilla::Layer * layer = mp_screen->createLayer(10);
00234 
00235     mp_healthBar = layer->createRectangle(Vector2(0, 0), Vector2(25000, 2000));
00236     mp_healthBar->background_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Red);
00237     mp_healthBar->border_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Red);
00238 
00239     Gorilla::Rectangle * healthBarBorder = layer->createRectangle(Vector2(0, 0), Vector2(25000, 2000));
00240     healthBarBorder->no_background();
00241     healthBarBorder->border_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Red);
00242     healthBarBorder->border_width(200);
00243 
00244     mp_energyBar = layer->createRectangle(Vector2(0, 2500), Vector2(25000, 2000));
00245     mp_energyBar->background_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Blue);
00246     mp_energyBar->border_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Blue);
00247 
00248     Gorilla::Rectangle * energyBarBorder = layer->createRectangle(Vector2(0, 2500), Vector2(25000, 2000));
00249     energyBarBorder->no_background();
00250     energyBarBorder->border_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Blue);
00251     energyBarBorder->border_width(200);
00252 }
00253 
00254 void NpcShipRO::destroyEffects()
00255 {
00256     ShipRO::destroyEffects();
00257     mp_frameNode->detachAllObjects();
00258     mp_frameNode->removeAllChildren();
00259     getSceneManager()->destroyMovableObject(mp_frameSprite);
00260     getSceneManager()->destroySceneNode(mp_frameNode);
00261     Gorilla::Silverback::getSingletonPtr()->destroyScreenRenderable(mp_screen);
00262 }

00280 void ProjectileRO::updateEffects(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation)
00281 {
00282     mp_projNode->setPosition(getObject()->position());
00283     mp_projNode->setOrientation(Vector3(0, 0, -1).getRotationTo(getObject()->getVelocity()));

00289     if(!m_resourcesLoaded) {
00290         m_resourcesLoaded = true;

00293 
00294 void ProjectileRO::createEffects()
00295 {
00296     mp_projNode = getSceneManager()->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00297 
00298     std::stringstream oss;
00299     oss << "Projectile" << renderId();
00300 
00301     // Dynamic point lights on projectiles
00302     mp_pointLight = getSceneManager()->createLight(oss.str());
00303     mp_pointLight->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_POINT);
00304     mp_pointLight->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0, 60, 0));
00305     mp_pointLight->setAttenuation(3250, 1.0, 0.0014, 0.000007);
00306     mp_pointLight->setCastShadows(false);
00307     mp_projNode->attachObject(mp_pointLight);
00308 
00309     oss << "P";
00310     if(mp_projectile->type() == ObjectType::PROJECTILE) {
00311         mp_particle = getSceneManager()->createParticleSystem(oss.str(), "Orewar/PlasmaStream");
00312         mp_pointLight->setDiffuseColour(0.0, 1, 0.0);
00313         mp_pointLight->setSpecularColour(0.2, 0.7, 0.2);
00314     } else if (mp_projectile->type() == ObjectType::ANCHOR_PROJECTILE) {
00315         mp_particle = getSceneManager()->createParticleSystem(oss.str(), "Orewar/Anchor");
00316         mp_pointLight->setDiffuseColour(1, 0.0, 0.0);
00317         mp_pointLight->setSpecularColour(0.7, 0.2, 0.2);
00318     }
00319     mp_particle->setEmitting(true);
00320     mp_projNode->attachObject(mp_particle);
00321 }
00322 
00323 void ProjectileRO::destroyEffects()
00324 {
00325     mp_projNode->detachAllObjects();
00326     mp_projNode->removeAllChildren();
00327     getSceneManager()->destroyLight(mp_pointLight);
00328     getSceneManager()->destroySceneNode(mp_projNode);
00329     getSceneManager()->destroyParticleSystem(mp_particle);
00330 }

00335 RenderModel::RenderModel(GameArena& model, SceneManager * mgr) : m_model(model), m_physicsRenderList(),
00336     mp_mgr(mgr)
00337 {
00338     m_model.addGameArenaListener(this);
00339 }
00340 
00341 
00342 void RenderModel::updateRenderList(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation)
00343 {
00344     for(std::vector<PhysicsRenderObject *>::iterator physIter = m_physicsRenderList.begin();
00345         physIter != m_physicsRenderList.end();
00346         physIter++) 
00347     {
00348         (*(*physIter)).updateEffects(elapsedTime, camOrientation);
00349     }
00350 
00351     for(std::vector<ConstraintRenderObject *>::iterator conIter = m_constraintRenderList.begin();
00352         conIter != m_constraintRenderList.end();
00353         conIter++) 
00354     {
00355         (*(*conIter)).updateEffects(elapsedTime, camOrientation);
00356     }
00357 }
00358 
00359 void RenderModel::newGameObject(GameObject * object)
00360 {
00361     PhysicsRenderObject * p_renderObj = NULL;
00362     if(object->type() == ObjectType::SHIP) {
00363         p_renderObj = new ShipRO((SpaceShip*)object, mp_mgr);
00364     } else if (object->type() == ObjectType::NPC_SHIP) {
00365         p_renderObj = new NpcShipRO((SpaceShip*)object, mp_mgr);
00366     } else if (object->type() == ObjectType::PROJECTILE
00367         || object->type() == ObjectType::ANCHOR_PROJECTILE) 
00368     {
00369         p_renderObj = new ProjectileRO((Projectile*)object, mp_mgr);
00370     }
00371 
00372     p_renderObj->loadSceneResources();
00373     p_renderObj->createEffects();
00374     m_physicsRenderList.push_back(p_renderObj);
00375 }
00376 
00377 void RenderModel::destroyedGameObject(GameObject * object)
00378 {
00379     for(std::vector<PhysicsRenderObject *>::iterator renderIter =  m_physicsRenderList.begin(); 
00380         renderIter != m_physicsRenderList.end();
00381         renderIter++) {
00382 
00383             if((*(*renderIter)).getObject() == object->phys()) {
00384             (*(*renderIter)).destroyEffects();
00385             delete (*renderIter);
00386             m_physicsRenderList.erase(std::remove(m_physicsRenderList.begin(), 
00387                 m_physicsRenderList.end(), (*renderIter)), m_physicsRenderList.end());
00388             return;
00389         }
00390     }
00391 }
00392 
00393 void RenderModel::newConstraint(Constraint * constraint)
00394 {
00395     ConstraintRenderObject * p_renderObj = new ConstraintRenderObject(constraint, mp_mgr);
00396 
00397     p_renderObj->loadSceneResources();
00398     p_renderObj->createEffects();
00399     m_constraintRenderList.push_back(p_renderObj);
00400 }
00401 
00402 void RenderModel::destroyedConstraint(Constraint * constraint)
00403 {
00404     for(std::vector<ConstraintRenderObject *>::iterator renderIter =  m_constraintRenderList.begin(); 
00405         renderIter != m_constraintRenderList.end();
00406         renderIter++) {
00407 
00408         if((*(*renderIter)).getConstraint() == constraint) {
00409             (*(*renderIter)).destroyEffects();
00410             delete (*renderIter);
00411             m_constraintRenderList.erase(std::remove(m_constraintRenderList.begin(), 
00412                 m_constraintRenderList.end(), (*renderIter)), m_constraintRenderList.end());
00413             return;
00414         }
00415     }
00416 }
00417 
00418 int RenderModel::getNumObjects() const
00419 {
00420     return m_physicsRenderList.size() + m_constraintRenderList.size();
00421 }
